attributes.action: create three additional bank holidays throughout the year to celebrate our culture and heritage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: St Andrew's Day, St David's Day and St George's Day should all be made National holidays so people from all over Britain can celebrate, understand what it is to be British and be proud to be British. We already work more hours and have less holidays than most of Europe and this would go some way to improving the situation and health of the British people.
